definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to be convinced (that sth is true)/to believe/to accept sth as true
informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
complaint letter/petition letter/see also 上訪|上访[shang4 fang3]

sentences.english: That was Hedwig. She brought a letter from Lupin .
sentences.chinese: 是海德薇，她帶來了一封盧平的信。

sentences.english: Please forgive me for opening your letter by mistake.
Because your life was transformed by this letter of acceptance, ? right?
sentences.chinese: 因爲你的人生被這封錄取信改變，沒錯吧？

sentences.english: If the inviter is studying in Canada, a letter of acceptance from the school.
sentences.chinese: 如果邀請人在加學習，校方出具的錄取信。

sentences.english: He throws the letter into the postbox carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他把信小心的投入了郵箱。

sentences.english: Through the analysis of personnel, indicating the Way of Heaven not be trusted.
sentences.chinese: 通過對人事的分析，說明天道不可信。
馬費神父，信準備好了嗎？

sentences.english: He sat down on the bottom step and opened the letter.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在樓梯最下一級把信打開。

sentences.english: I am writing to find out the possibility of our having a brief meeting some time next week…
sentences.chinese: 我去信詢問一下我們能否在下週某個時間見面。

sentences.english: This woman just finished the farewell ceremony for his husband, came back home to want to accept a letter.
sentences.chinese: 這位婦女剛爲他先生辦完告別式，一回到家想收個信。

sentences.english: Please pop my letter into the nearest letter-box.
sentences.chinese: 請把我的信投入最近的信箱。

sentences.english: Bob's mother looked over his letter before he mailed it.
sentences.chinese: 巴布的媽媽在他未把信發出前把信看了一遍。

sentences.english: Bob's mother looked over his letter before he mailed it.
sentences.chinese: 巴布的媽媽在他未把信發出前把信看了一遍。
我從來不信捕風捉影的傳聞。

sentences.english: Home use various methods to send letter also no echo.
sentences.chinese: 家裏用盡各種方式寄去的信也石沉大海。

definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
the person himself/I (humble form used in speeches)/oneself/myself/in person/personal
to be convinced (that sth is true)/to believe/to accept sth as true
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
